resources.string: Set an ICON and NICKNAME then you can comment !)
[#1465dfff]Static Body{CLEARCOLOR}[#d2e9cdff] - is a motionless body with infinite mass, which is not acted upon by external forces.
[#bcab79ff]Kinematic Body{CLEARCOLOR}[#d2e9cdff] - is a stationary body with infinite mass that is not affected by external forces other than linear and angular velocity.
[#1a932cff]Dynamic Body{CLEARCOLOR}[#d2e9cdff] - is a moving body with a certain mass, which is acted upon by external forces.
[#bc380eff]Joints{CLEARCOLOR}[#d2e9cdff] - serve to {GRADIENT=bc380eff;d2e9cdff;1.0;1.0}connect two bodies{ENDGRADIENT} to each other. Typical examples in games are rag dolls, swings, and pulleys.
